akn:subsection.akn:heading: Federal insurance barred to lenders with access to State or private insurance

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Federal insurance barred to lenders with access to State or private insurance Except as provided in subsection (b), the Secretary shall not issue certificates of insurance under section 1079 of this title to lenders in a State if the Secretary determines that every eligible institution has reasonable access in that State to a State or private nonprofit student loan insurance program which is covered by an agreement under section 1078(b) of this title.
